lead_paragraph: Jury deliberations should not remain private if evidence emerges that the discussions were affected by racial or ethnic bias, the justices ruled.
snippet: Jury deliberations should not remain private if evidence emerges that the discussions were affected by racial or ethnic bias, the justices ruled....

headline.main: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption
